# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We aim to support the latest minor release. Security fixes are backported when feasible.

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 0.1.x   | ✅ Yes     |
| <0.1.0  | ❌ No      |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security issues privately to:

- Email: security@camerak.dev

Include:

- A clear description of the issue
- Steps to reproduce
- Affected versions
- Any relevant logs or screenshots

We will acknowledge reports within 72 hours and work with you on a fix and disclosure timeline.
